msContents.summary: The Madanānanda is an otherwise unknown kāmaśāstra by unknown author. The title itself seems to appear only on the outer face of the upper cover, written by a modern hand in devanāgarī script. The manuscript is incomplete: the text ends abruptly on the verso of folio 13, at the beginning of line 9; starts again on the recto of the following folio (14) and breaks again on the same face, in the middle of line 10.

msItem.title: Madanānanda
msItem.incipit:
sarvānandanidānaṃ śivayos tad vo stu modāya | yad dṛṣṭvā nissāraṃ saṃsāraṃ manva
te narās sāraṃ | - namo madanāya ratipriyāya | - ratikāntaṃ namaskṛtya jagadāhlādahetave | śrīmanmādhavanā
thāya narendreṇedam ucyate | - īśasvayaṃbhuharayo hariṇe kṣaṇānāṃ yenākriyanta satataṃ
gṛhakuṃbhadāsāḥ | vācām space left blank for one syll.? gocaracaritrivicitritāya tasmai namo bhagavate makaradhvajāya | | - nārā
yaṇaṃ triṇayanaṃ nalināsanaṃ vā nāthaṃ yatheccham avagacchatu jīvalokaḥ | gātraṃ jagattritaya
mohanamaṃ ganānāṃ kūlaṃ kaṣastanabharaṃ kuladaivataṃ naḥ |

athāhaṃ naranārīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca śubhāśubhaṃ | vicāryya sarvāśastrāṇi kathayami yathā | māṃsavarṇair nna
kair bhūpaḥ padmatāmropamair ddhanī | raktair apuṣpitair martyo bhavet saubhāgyabhāk bhuvi |
msItem.explicit:
śṛṃgāravṛṣabhaṃ | laḷitāsanaṃ | madanatoraṇaṃ | āndoḷinaṃ | padakajjaḷī | bhaṃsikaṃ | mahīdharābhrāntaṃ |
unnatarataṃ | līlāsanaṃ | śṛṃgārakautukam iti | - yatra puruṣaṃ karābhyāṃ śayyām āliṃgyati nārī puruṣa
sya ūrū pari

pādāṃguḷīsu pārṣṇī sirāvirahitau tadā | māṃsaḷau śūḍhagulphau ca kūrmmakṛṣṭhasamā
vapi | bhavetāñ caraṇau yasya sa bhavet pṛthivīpatiḥ | vikṛtāśūrpasaṃkāśāsasvedau hrasvapā
ṇḍarau | romaśau caraṇau yasya sa bhaved duḥkhajīvitaḥ |

extent.measure: 1 cover (being itself a palm leaf), 14 numbered folios (the last folio serves also as back cover).

collation.desc: Outer face: a paratext on three lines is hardly legible, partly due to the darkened colour of the cover, partly because it is covered by a piece of paper glued onto the cover and overwritten by the shelfmarks and the title written by a modern hand. Inner face: blank.
The beginning of each section of the work is marked with the name of the topic dealed therein written on the left margin of the folio.

supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation, with sparse holes bored by insects.

binding.p: Both "covers" are themselves palm leaves. The binding is made by a string tied around the bundle.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces added in transliteration where possible.
